channel.title: apple on Blake Merryman

item.title: Initial Thoughts - Apple Special Event, Sept. 9, 2015
item.description: We all knew what was coming and it was still a doozy. The rumor mill basically got everything correct and this was still one of the best keynotes in a long time. I plan on writing more in depth about each major topic but for now, here are my first impressions. Lack of “Status Updates” In the past, Apple has kicked off every event with a stacatto of numbers about how great Apple has been doing.
